1.Text: Ciiiiid! It's no use hiding!

(She's still after me?! Talk about a stage five
clinger...)

You promised to have lunch with me today, remember?
Now come on out!

(More like you coerced me...　Anyway, it's gonna be
a real pain if she catches me.)

(But! Make it to that totally side character hiding
spot I found the other day, and I'm home free! All I
gotta do then is wait out the storm—)
Oh my...
Cid! Why are you here?!

R-Rose... Why're you in such a side chara—I mean,
secluded spot?

I often come here when I need to do some thinking
alone. I never would have thought you knew about this
place, too...
Heehee, maybe it was fate that brought us both here?
(As always, she's stuck on something weird...)

...But no, this isn't fate, is it? You saw me looking
troubled and came running to the rescue... Isn't that
right?
In that case, I must lay bare my heart. Please listen to my woes, Cid...!
Uh... I'm actually a little busy at the moment—

...I know you're around here somewhere, Cid!
You can't hide from me!
Cl-Claire...?!
That voice... Is she looking for you?
...Think I'll stay here a little longer after all.
Oh, I see! Then let's chat while you do!

So, the truth is, I'm unsure what to do for the
academy's anniversary ceremony...
R-Really...

It's tradition for the student council president to
do a performance... But I'm ashamed to say that I'm
at a loss for ideas.

Well, why not just stick to what you know? Like a
sword dance or something.

I had considered that, but given that it's a special
occasion, I wanted to make it enjoyable for the
students.

If you don't mind, could you help me brainstorm? You
being you, I'm sure you'll have some excellent ideas!
Well, since you put me on the spot like that...

(Not gonna lie, I couldn't care less about the
ceremony... But leaving here and getting caught by
Claire is something I'd like to avoid...)

(Anyway, I'll just say whatever and wing it from
there.)
Well... How about singing and dancing?

Hm, like a concert. That does sound like something
the students would enjoy. Except...

I'm honestly not all that confident I can make
something that will satisfy the entire school all
by myself...

But if someone else were to take the stage with me...
And if there were someone supporting me from the
shadows, I would feel much more reassured.
(Supporting her from the shadows...?)

If I had you with me, Cid, I just know I could do
anything... Can you help me, if you be so kind?

(In other words, a "shadow producer." That doesn't
sound bad at all!)

(The hot new idol, who burst onto the scene like a
shooting star...and behind her, the mysterious guy
who cranks out hits with laser-focused precision—
something like that!)

(Not quite a shadowbroker, but it could be a fun
change of pace.)
Okay. I'm in if you want me.
D-Do you mean it?!

Heehee, looks like we'll be working together closely
to craft the perfect performance, all the way up to
the ceremony!

Um, we actually need to find that other person to be
on stage with you...

O-Oh, that's right! Well, we can pool our efforts
there, too!

(The ceremony has gotta be a success, but what's the
fun in stopping there?)

(I'll make Rose into the biggest star in the academy,
no, the entire kingdom!)
(Yeah, as the Producer in Shadow!)

2.Text:
(Hmm... The first problem is picking someone to pair
up with Rose.)

(They'd have to be able to share the stage without
being completely overshadowed, so...)
...I guess it'd have to be someone like Alexia.

But having a princess like her doing idol stuff seems
like it'd be real pain—
What about me?

Wow, would you look at the time! Guess I should be
heading to class—

Not so fast. Do you have something you want to say to
me?
Um... No? Anyway, I'm kinda busy, so I'd better be—

Rose put you up to something, didn't she. I hear
she's looking for someone to appear in the ceremony
with her.
H-How did you know...?!
Judging by that reaction, I'm right on the mark.

As for how, Rose spoke to me herself. I held off
answering at the time...

...But if you're involved, that changes everything.
Chances for fun like this don't come around
everyday!

Although, I am quite busy, you know. Normally I'd
never have the time for such frivolities... Catch my
drift?

Now if a certain Pooch were to ask me sweetly, I may
find myself willing to help...
Uh, I've got it covered, so no need for that.
Come on, be honest. I know you're desperate.
And I know you just want to be in the limelight...
Did you say something?

No. *sigh*... Well, whatever. If you insist, then the
job's yours.

Hmm, defiant to the end, are we? I'll have you know
that I intend to fund the entire production if I
join.
Please, my princess! Please help us!!!

Heehee, you should've said so from the start!
You should feel fortunate that I'm gracing you with
my presence!

(Alright, the team's assembled! Alexia may be a royal
pain in butt, but if she foots the bill then I can't
complain!)
...And now Alexia is on board for the project, too.

So, you truly considered what I spoke to you of
before! Thank you so much, Princess Alexia!

O-Oh, well... I suppose I did. At any rate, let's
work to make this a wonderful performance.
Yes, by all means!

I owe you thanks as well, Cid. You must have been
very persuasive!
Umm... Sure, I guess?

No need to be so modest. I'd expect no less from
our...producer, was it?
"Producer"?

Apparently, it's a term for the role he will be
playing in this endeavor.
Huh, interesting...

(I'm more curious about what's going on between these
two... There's definitely more at play here than just
a student council president working with one of the
student body.)

(But I guess it doesn't matter either way. I'm going
to use this performance to show Pooch just how
irresistible I am!)

Getting straight to business, we need to prepare for
the upcoming ceremony.

I'd like to discuss wardrobe first, but how about the
two of you?

That's fine with me. Performing in our uniforms would
be rather dull.

I agree with Alexia. We should get your outfits made
soon so that you can get used to wearing them.

Thank you. I'll invite some of the finest designers
from Oriana so we can decide on the look.

From Oriana...? Won't that take too long? If it's
designers we need, I can arrange for some with a snap
of my fingers.

Orianan designers stand at the forefront of fashion.
I think it could be worth it, even if it does take a
bit more time.

Well, there's no guarantee that the audience will
appreciate "the forefront." I think a designer who
knows the traditions and culture of Midgar in and out
would be better suited to the task.

...I can understand your line of thinking as well.
In which case...
...Let's have our dear producer decide.

Me? But I suppose this is the type of thing where a
producer would step in. Lemme think here...

The thing is, I know someone whose friend's mother's
boss's wife has a younger brother with a fiancé who
has a personal designer.

They're known for being really good and working
fast. I have them do stuff for me sometimes, too, so
wanna give them a shot?

That's quite the distant chain of connection...
Are you sure they're reliable?

I see no problem. If this designer is a friend of
yours, then I'm sure they're fine!

Oh, they are. And just in case they aren't, how about
you retain one of your picks as well, Alexia?

Yeah, I suppose that makes sense. All right, we'll
leave the designer to you. Not that I'm getting my
hopes up.

(Now that we've decided who we're gonna ask, we gotta
think of what kind of outfits to make.)

3.Text:
(Hmm, what to do with the outfits... It's not like I
knew a ton about idols in my previous life.)

(I'm gonna have to rely on what I do remember while
thinking of what most people in society here will
like... The best place to start would be scoping the
lay of the land.)

(Now, who do I know that'll spit out the most basic
takes for this world, no filter...)

...So, you're askin' what I'd pick if I could have
Rose wear anything I wanted? That's a super tough
question.

You're serious, right?! Anything? Like, ANYTHING
anything?! You really mean it?!
Y-Yeah... But this is just an "if" scenario.

A swimsuit! And it's gotta be one of those ones
that's like a string! Rose would look amazing!
Heh...

Wh-What gives, Po...? I coulda swore you just laughed
at me...

Get with the program, Po... You're so clueless.
See, in situations like these...

...it's all about if you can just barely get
a peek of somethin' or not, right?

O-Oh, good point! A gentleman's horizon lies beyond
what is hidden!

Exactly! We're gonna peep what's past that line!
You and me, bro!
Gimme a peek of the sweet stuff, baby!
Uh, hahaha...

(Oh man, these guys are hopeless. Not gonna learn a
thing from them...)

(Well, guess I'll have to see what they can pull off
with their sense and what I remember.)

...And so, you have come to speak with myself and
the rest of us at Mitsugoshi?

It is a great honor to have you seek us out for
advice in person, my lord! I, your humble servant
Gamma, shall endeavor with all of my being to fulfill
your wishes!
It's nothing that grandiose...but thanks.

Now, let us try to settle on a firm image. May I ask
a few questions of you, my lord?
Sure, if there's anything you need to know, ask away.

Thank you. Firstly, can you tell me more of what you
mean when you say "idol"?

Hmm, let's see... An idol is like...someone who's
adored by her fans because she makes them happy by
smiling, singing, and dancing.

I see. So, they are similar to actresses or opera
singers?

They're more mass-market than all that. Think...
kinda ordinary at worst, or familiar at best.

So, you are after commonplace dresses meant for the
general public. In that case, Mitsugoshi can launch a
new brand that—

Uh, wait, wait. I was talking about the idols
themselves, not their dresses.
Which means?

I guess the beauty I'm after is more cute than calm
and composed. Something with school uniform elements
to it could work, too.

A school uniform would certainly create an impression
of familiarity. In that case, how about
something that incorporates the sailor collars that
have been so popular of late?

That might be kinda plain. It'd also be a little too
obvious of an attempt to appeal to the crowd.
What...?!

(The sailor style we were told would revolutionize
the fashion world is...plain?!)

(The trends of society truly are beneath our　lord's
sophistication... How I hate that I can't see what
it is he sees!)

I'd like to hear some other ideas, but maybe this is
too tough of a task.

Thing is, I can't do this myself. You're my only
hope, Gamma!
Huh...? S-So, you mean to say...!

(Can't afford to compromise here... An idol's
costumes are her lifeblood. They can make a huge
difference in how much she brings in—no joke!)

(Doesn't change the fact that I have no fashion sense
or skill at making clothes, though...so Gamma's the
only one I can turn to!)

Um, my lord...to come to me with such a request at
a time like this...
...It's quite unfair.

Huh? Well, maybe it was a little unfair of me to dump
all this on you.

I'll do my best to help, too. Call it a collaborative
effort.
A-A collaborative effort?!

(This powerful gaze... Should I take this to mean
he's serious? But am I even worthy of such
attention...?)

(...No, Gamma. My lord singled me out specifically.
Which means there is only on course of action—)

...A collaborative effort between the two of us.
Let's give it our all.
Y-Yeah... Looking forward to working with you.

So, the person I know whose friend's mother's boss's...
Uh, anyway, I had that designer make the dresses, so
how do they fit?

What an adorable design! And so easy to move about
in...!

Yes, very novel... I've never seen anything quite
like them. I think these will do just fine.
Awesome, that's what I like to hear.

The designer's delicate heart really shows in the
fine workmanship and attention to detail.

I agree. I can almost sense how they must have felt
while making them...
(Huh, well I don't get it at all.)

Since I can't imagine either of you are used to
costumes like these, how about wearing them for a
while as practice?

A fine idea. Rehearsing in such wonderful attire will
also be motivating!

So, with our wardrobe settled...next we need music
for us to sing and dance to.

Right. That's why I was thinking of asking this
composer who lives next door to a guy who works
for my classmate's dad to—

Hehe, no, this time I insist! I'll commission the
most beautiful music ever!
Hmm...?

Very well. We'll leave all matters of music up to
you, Alexia. I look forward to hearing the results!
(I'm not so sure about this...)

4.Text:
Now then, Alexia. How goes the composition you
commissioned?

Oh, it's perfect, of course. I had one of our court
composers pen it, you see.

Well, if you will allow me to borrow the score for a
moment... I'll play it on the piano.

Heehee, you'd better brace yourself too, Pooch. I put
every little request I could think of into this song!
Wow, I can't wait.

(Yep, I'm seriously stoked...stoked for the moment
when this world's concept of music is blown to
smithereens!)

(This melody is...both pretty and complex. And the
rhythm is so unique, the tempo so fast...)

(I've never heard anything like this in my life...
and yet it puts me in such a joyful mood...)

(...Huh? Somehow this isn't what I had imagined...
But, it's still a good song, I suppose.)
...Whew. That seems to be the end.

Wow, Rose, that was great. And that song you had made
was pretty awesome too, Alexia.
O-Oh, yeah... Of course it was.

Yes, it truly was a wonderful composition! I'd never
seen a score like that before, but its bright and fun
atmosphere carried through all the same!

And the lyrics written here in the score are
delightful as well! The way they're meant to cheer
someone on and bring a smile to their face fits the
theme of our performance perfectly!

Um, lyrics? Oh, I didn't know the composer did that
much...
Wow, talk about amazing! I'm honestly moved.

(But, this, too, is because the producer in the
shadows was on the job.)

Alexia insisted on handling this herself, but when I
think of the music of this world...yep, it's
inevitably gonna be Classical.

That's why I gotta make our idol's theme! I'll whip
up something in that vein that references the hits,
and have Epsilon fill in the rest and write up the
sheet music...

Also, the lyrics need to be positive! No dropping
cryptic shadowbroker lines this time!

Also, gotta remember there's choreography to think
about, too. But those two are fit enough to handle
just about anything, so no need to hold back there—

Okay, that should do it! Just gotta get Epsilon to do
her thing, and it'll be perfect!

(Hell yeah, I'm knocking these idol issues out one
by one... That was a peak producer move, if I do say
so myself.)

Why do you seem so proud of yourself? I'm the one who
commissioned the composer, you know.

Okay, okay. Look, with the music safely settled, all
that's left is to practice singing and dancing.

Oh right, the dancing... Judging by the music, I can
imagine the choreography will be quite unlike
anything we've seen before...

Um, if I may...! Could you perhaps allow me to see to
the choreography?

You two have done everything so far. I need to be of
some use as well...!
Hey, no need to worry about that...

(I've already come up with a simple dance routine
anyway...)

Well, if she insists, then maybe we should let her?
She certainly seems enthusiastic about the idea.

Hmm... Okay, it doesn't have to be anything too
intense, but try dancing to the music. I'll play
something appropriate on the piano.
Thank you! Now, I'll simply take up my sword and—
(Idols with swords... Honestly, it just might work.)

(Gotta start 'em on the basics first. I have big
dreams of takin' these two all the way to the top,
after all!)

(Still, it'd defeat the purpose to dull Rose's pep by
shooting everything down here... Just have to show
her the moves in a soft, natural way—)

Whew, boy, am I tired. Why, I can hardly stand up
straight. Woops...

And, wow, the sun sure is bright today! It really
brings a smile to my face!

...Um, what? What's gotten into you? Maybe you should
go see the nurse.

Wait, Alexia. Why not work Cid's movements just now
into our dance?

The steps and gestures are innovative, rhythmical,
graceful... They should fit the song perfectly!
Let's try dancing to the music once more!
Um...really?

Yes. Though it may have been by accident, Cid here
has given us a wonderful hint!
No, no, I didn't do anything.

(Whew, glad she picked up on it... As athletic as
they both are, all that's left now is practice!)

(...Or is it? Can't help feeling that I'm forgetting
something...)

5.Text: Strange... We've rehearsed so much, and yet...

Yes, the results are, how should I put it...far from
satisfactory.
What does our producer think? Please be honest.
Hmm, well...

(They aren't in sync at all! To the point it's almost
impressive! Can two people be any more out of step
with each other?)

First off, your field of view is kinda limited, Rose.
It's like you can't see Alexia there dancing with
you.
Ulp, you have a point...

And as for you, Alexia, you're being too formulaic.
I'm talking so rigid that it shows.
B-But, that shouldn't be...true...

(Judging by those reactions, they both know what
they're doing wrong...)

(I guess the issue is that they don't know how to fix
it. And these aren't the kind of things that I can
make click for them just by using the right combo of
words.)

(Having said that, it wouldn't be great to send them
out there as-is... Hmm, I gotta do something—)
(...Huh? Th-This magic...?!)

So, do we simply need to rehearse more and improve...
Um, Cid?
Sh-She's coming... I gotta hide!
Coming? Who do you—
Oh, Ciiiid!!!
Is that...Claire I hear? She sounds very angry.
My life as a producer may be over...!
Wh-What?! You can't be serious, not after all this!

Then we have no choice but to act in unison to
conceal your presence.
Th-Thanks! I'll escape through the window!

Ohhh, Ciiiid... Just how many promises do you intend
to break...?

...Oh, Princess Rose, Princess Alexia. Why are you
dressed like that?

We have our reasons... I would also appreciate it if
you did not attempt to pry any further.
Hmm... Well, okay. My lips are sealed.

Now, about Cid! I know I saw him enter this room, so
where is he?
Beats me. Maybe you mistook him for someone else?

Don't be ridiculous! I of all people would never
mistake Cid for anyone else!

Maybe...you've pulled some cruel trick on him again!
And now you're trying to keep me from finding out—

Stop right there. As I stated before, there is a good
reason we are dressed as we are.

That is also why we are doing our preparations in
absolute secrecy...with the assistance of someone.
What? How does that matter?

Well, since we are working in secret, we chose
someone inconspicuous to be our assistant. Isn't that
right, Alexia?

...Yes. He's the plainest of students with black
hair and no defining features to make him stand out
whatsoever.
And you're suggesting I mistook him for Cid?
Yeah, though I know it must be hard to admit..
Uh-huh...

O-Of course, Cid makes up for his nondescript
appearance with his pure heart! Alexia, don't you
agree?!

Huh? W-Well, I don't know if it's his heart or his
love for gold that's pure, but, sure...
...Do you honestly think that?
Y-Yes...

...Well, I suppose you would know after toying with
him like you have. Fine, I'll take you at your word
for today.
We appreciate it.

But! If you lead him on again...you know what will
happen, yes?
Yes, we understand.
Hmph, good. See you later.
...Whew. Looks like we weathered the storm.

Although I did feel a little chill run through me
when you turned her attention my way. But maybe us
being able to ad-lib our stories to match saved the
day.
Heehee, I know you would be able to handle it.
Nice! Just don't forget that feeling, okay?
Ack! Don't jump out like that! You scared me!
What do you mean by "that feeling"?

What I mean is it might be good if you act in sync
like you did just now when you sing and dance, too.

Moving however you want and having faith in your
partner so you can loosen up are different things.

I see... It does make sense when you explain it that
way. Thank you for the wonderful advice!

You almost sounded like a real producer for a second.
But, maybe you're onto something.

(Hopefully we're okay in the song and dance
department now. But I feel like this still isn't
quite enough.)

(We need one last bit of spice to really make
them shine as idols. In other words—)

6.Text: So...the big moment has arrived.
Yes... Are you nervous, Alexia?
D-Don't be absurd...!

...No, actually I am a little nervous. I can't
control the pounding in my chest...

I feel the same way. But this stage fright is
different than what accompanies my official duties,
so there's also a part of me that's enjoying it.

We've put in so much hard work leading up to today.
All that's left is to have fun... That's what Cid,
our producer, said.

Speaking of which, where has our dear producer run
off to? He could have at least said something before
we go on stage...

He mentioned certain preparations in the venue,
something about handing out "glow sticks."

At any rate, let's do what we're here to do!
And don't for get to smile!
...Yeah, let's make this fun!
Hey, what's the assembly for today?

Apparently, it's some school anniversary. I don't
really know what for, though.
Huh, sounds like a drag.

The student council is putting it on, so I suppose
there'll just be some formal address and then done.

Then what're these glowing sticks?
They said somethin' about them responding to magic.
Yeah, I wonder...

Sorry to keep you all waiting. There will now be a
performance by Rose Oriana and Alexia Midgar.
Please give them a large round of applause, everyone.
A performance? Not some boring speech?
...Hnngh! Look, Skel! Look at what they're wearing!

Thank you for coming today, everyone. We truly
appreciate it!

I hope you will all enjoy this performance Alexia
and I prepared for this memorable day!
Now, without further ado...start the musi—
Stop right there!!!
Huh...?

I've come to take over the ceremony! This stage now
belongs to me!
Wh-What?! And just who are you?!

Hehehe... I don't have to answer that. Let me just
say...that I'm a beautiful elven thief with silver
hair and a darling little mole under her eye.
Wait, you're obviously Natsum—
NO, I AM NOT!
Whoa, what the heck is this?
Beats me. But that thief...she really does it for me!
(Alright, the crowd is buzzing. Just as I expected!)
...So, you want me to interrupt their performance?

Yeah, but not for real. Just show up and be like,
"This stage is mine!"

Then when they take you out, everyone will go crazy
as two idols who're strong in a fight but also
super cute are born!

Interesting... So, if I'm going to let them beat me,
how should I dress?

Eh, just wear something that fits the part and a
mask, and you'll be fine. I'll leave that up to you.
Something that fits the part, hm... Understood.

Hehehe... To think the day would come when I can
reap vengeance upon that rotten princess with my
lord's approval!
Uh... Well, do me proud.

(I was kinda uneasy about all this...but all Beta
needs to do is raise a believable amount of chaos
and then take the fall!)

Prepare yourselves! That goes double for you,
Princess Alexia!
She very much seems to despise you. Any idea why?
...No, not really.

Y-You're so shameless...! Well, let's see how you
like this!

Wha...?! Watch what you're doing! Someone could get
hurt!

I will take this stage for myself! Just as you tore
him away from me!!!
Um, I really do think she has it in for you...

And I'm telling you I have no idea what this is
about...

(...Huh? It almost looks like Beta is serious. She's
supposed to just taunt them a bit and then let
herself lose...)

Thieving vixens like you always forget their crimes
so quickly!!!

Seriously, what's this all about?! Get ahold of
yourself, Natsu—
I told you, I'm not Natsume!!!

Um, Alexia! And you, Miss Thief! Please, calm
yourselves...!

(How did this happen? It's like a scene from
a soap opera...)

(Anyway, I gotta up the entertainment factor before
things get too serious!)

(As the producer in the shadow, as a lone side
character, there's only one thing I can do—)
C-C'mon, princess!!! You can do it!!!
That pathetic yelp sounds like...!
Y-Yeah! That goes for both of you!
All we can do is cheer you on...but do your best!
Pooch's voice has stirred up massive support!

(Th-This isn't fair! I want to be cheered on by my
lord too!)

(But he did order me to play the part of the villain
here... Fulfilling my mission comes first!)

Alexia! Let's trounce this thief and take back our
stage!
By all means! We'll do it together, Rose!

7.Text:
Perfect coordination and supple movements...
Your efforts up to this point are plain to see.

That's right! We put in a lot of work for today!
That's why we can't let you interfere any longer!

Indeed, and I won't. Put the crystallization of your
accomplishment on display for all to see.

But never forget! Should you do anything untoward
again, I am always watching you! Farewell!
W-Wait! What's that supposed to mean?!
Alexia. Leave her to the guards.

More importantly...look. Look at everyone out there
cheering for us.
Huh...?

The student council president and Princess Alexia are
amazing! Who wouldn't fall for girls who can fight
like that!

They're so cute, but also so strong...! I love you
both!!!

These cheers, this sea of light... It's all directed
at us... Don't you feel proud?

I suppose I do. The real show is yet to come,
so let's keep the momentum going!

(Excellent, excellent. The fight dragged on a bit,
but the excitement has reached a fever pitch, just
as I'd hoped!)

(All that's left now is the big show! C'mon, ladies,
knock it out of the park!)

Sorry to keep you waiting, everyone! We will now
resume our performance!
Now, let's try this again... Start the music!

(Alexia seems like she's having so much fun... I need
to make sure I enjoy myself just as much as her!)

(Rose looks so pretty... But I won't let myself be
outshone!)

(They're both performing as practiced...no, even
better than that!)

(It's like they're in tune with the students' energy.
Gotta remember to say thanks to Beta, and Eta for
making the glow sticks.)
Po! Did ya see that?!
No, I didn't, Skel!

Dumbass! Ya gotta look from a lower angle! Moments
like this're all about puttin' your body on the line!
But I can't go any...agh! S-Someone's stepping on me!
...You're in the way.
(Those idiots...)

—That concludes our performance! Thank you so much,
everyone!
There was a little disturbance, but did you have fun?
...This could make serious bank.

(It'd be a huge waste to let all this crazy energy
fizzle out with today's one-off. I should totally
market them to the world as academy idols.)

(But in that case, I don't really like my chances
with just two people. Maybe I'll get Sherry to join
so we can reach a broader fanbase...)

I owe you my thanks, Alexia. It was because of your
aid that the performance went so superbly.

Not at all. I simply didn't want to be outdone by
you. Looking at it from another viewpoint, it's all
because of you that I'm standing here now...

So, I owe you my gratitude as well. Thank you very
much.

...Welp, guess that's that. Seems like they both got
what they wanted out of it anyway.

Why, Cid, your cheeks are about to burst... Is your
first lunch with me in so long really that delicious?
(No, it's because you forced all this in my mouth...)

Do you have any idea how much trouble I went through
to catch you? There was one point when I thought I
had you, but it turned out to be a case of mistaken
identity...
Wow...
(But yeah, I actually do know, though.)

By the way, did you see the anniversary ceremony the
other day?

I've been hearing talk of the princesses' performance
everywhere lately. People are saying it was the
stuff of legends.

But here's the thing—they apparently had a mysterious
producer working behind the scenes.
Huh, really. I had no idea.

(This is it! This is what I want to be!
Hell yeah, I really nailed it!)
...Why the grin?
Huh? I-I'm not grinning.

Heehee. Could it be you're imagining me wearing one
of those outfits?

I swear, you are the most incorrigible brother ever!
Normally I'm not one to care about dressing up, but
fine! I'll show you if the opportunity arises!
Y-Yay...

(Despite all the trouble, I'm still glad I did it.
I even created a performance that'll go down in
academy history in the process!)
(Yep, doesn't get much better than that!)

And so Cid finished his work as the producer in
shadow. He heard talk of himself for some time after,
and could not help but grin when he did...
